import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' const RegistrationForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ id: '', name: '', joiningDate: '', address: '', bloodGroup: '', title: '', coverPhoto: null, profilePicture: null, contact: '', role: '', email: '', password: '', }); const bloodGroups = ['A+', 'A-', 'B+', 'B-', 'AB+', 'AB-', 'O+', 'O-']; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { const { name } = e.target; const file = e.target.files[0]; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: file }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8000/createaccount',formData) .then(res=>console.log(res)) }; return ( <>

Registration Form

{/* ID */}
{/* Name */}
{/* Joining Date */}
{/* Address */}
{/* Blood Group */}
{/* Title */}
{/* Cover Photo */}
{/* Profile Picture */}
{/* Contact */}
{/* Role */}
{/* Email */}
{/* Password */}
{/* Submit Button */}
); }; export default RegistrationForm;
